title: pictures of old bibles
content:
Yesterday I visited the impressive collection of old bibles at Rosendahls book printers in Esbjerg, Denmark ( [http://www.rosendahls.dk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018200804/http:/www.rosendahls.dk/ "http://www.rosendahls.dk")). Pictures are online at:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/2krogh/sets/72157604011169923/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018200804/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/2krogh/sets/72157604011169923/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/2krogh/sets/72157604011169923/")

- Andreas Krautwald
author: kvaternion

comments.content:
More photos will be added as we get them processed.

– Andreas Krautwald

Currently uploading photos of the Gustav Vasa bible and the first danish bible (Christian III)

/Thomas

Awesome stuff, love those drop caps! Their stylized elements seem to me to have a similarity with other design diciplines of that time - or there abouts ...hmm, interesting.

Thanks!
